Text:
Just a bit of input. The game runs just fine with the OR2006C2C.exe that's unpacked by default (one AV found a heuristic result on VirusTotal, but I'm sure it's a false positive). 

However, there's a .rar file in the folder which contains another executable with the same name. I assume it's an alternative crack, but unlike the first one, this one loads a lot of other, suspicious instructions from advapi32.dll related to starting services and writing registry keys. I'd suggest you all stay away from that one, as it may contain a trojan.

With that said, thanks for the upload.

@hitesh78 "d2dx9_29.dll was not found" is a error that ocours when directx isnt updated to the latest version so first i would try to update it
All people who wanna play online: download Tunngle, install, search for 'Outrun 2006' network in the search bar and enter that channel. We can now play multiplayer via LAN.
still the BEST driving game for the PC, maybe flatout 2
